t_flex

Source: R/flex_functions.R
t_flex.Rd

t_flex

Usage

t_flex(mymatrix)

Arguments

mymatrix

matrix to use

Value

matrix

Examples

m <- matrix(rnorm(100), nrow = 10)

t_flex(m)
